title: [Widow's Beach, Atoll Path]
description: The path wends between the sea and a partial wall of jagged, salt-stained stones, a circular platform in the distance.  The sand along the path appears to be arranged in runelike patterns that shift ever so slightly with each wave.

The path twists toward a circular stone platform, and a partial wall made of jagged stones weathers the test of time and the ocean.  The sand appears to be arranged in rune-like patterns that shift ever so slightly with each wave.
